text: Noflen was a municipality of the Swiss canton of Bern. It is in the Bern- Mittelland administrative district. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Gelterfingen, MÃ¼hledorf and Noflen merged into the municipality of Kirchdorf. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
